cs.IT, cs.ITP, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of index coding, which is a communication problem involving multiple receivers with side information. This problem is closely related to information theory and coding theory, which are covered in the cs.IT and cs.ITP sub-categories. The paper also uses techniques from optimization and probability theory, which are relevant to the cs.DS and cs.SI sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the practical implications of the results, which could be relevant to the cs.NI sub-category.
